text:
@maddow @SuMoh7 @GovernorKayIvey should follow @NYGovCuomo's lead: ask all hospitals in that area & in the state to work together, share resources, ease strain on Montgomery's hospitals. By Apr 1 Cuomo had all NYC hospitals doing that + transferring patients to upstate 🏥
https://t.co/EQhHUg91VP
